```{r}

library(ggplot2)

c <- colors()
x <- rep(1:9, length.out = length(c))
y <- rep(1:9, each = (length(c)/9))
# f <- as.factor(round(rep(1:9, times = (length(c)/9))/2))

data.frame(c, x, y) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = y, y = x, fill = c)) +
  geom_tile(color = "white") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c) +
  coord_equal() +
  labs(x = "", y = "", fill = "Average \nATE",
       title = "Combined exposure ATE recovery") +
  theme_void()


```
